title: Microsoft Teams: Direct guest join for Zoom and Webex meetings on video-enabled certified Teams Android devices
description:
Direct guest join (aka
Third-party meeting join) is an ability to join meetings of other meeting
providers from Microsoft Teams. Third-party meetings will appear on the Teams
calendar and users will be able to join them the same way they join any other Teams
meeting. This functionality will be limited to video-enabled certified Teams
Android devices and will support only Zoom and Webex meetings.
